def find_intersecting_elements(list1, list2, list3):
    set1 = set(list1)
    set2 = set(list2)
    set3 = set(list3)
    intersecting_elements = set1 & set2 | set3
    sorted_elements = sorted(intersecting_elements, reverse=True)
    return sorted_elements

def find_intersecting_elements(list1, list2, list3):
    set1 = set(list1)
    set2 = set(list2)
    set3 = set(list3)
    intersecting_elements = (set1 | set2) & set3
    sorted_elements = sorted(intersecting_elements, reverse=True)
    return sorted_elements

def find_intersecting_elements(list1, list2, list3):
    set1 = set(list1)
    set2 = set(list2)
    set3 = set(list3)
    intersecting_elements = set1 & set2 & set3
    sorted_elements = sorted(intersecting_elements, reverse=False)
    return sorted_elements
